sections.paragraph: - கொடிதாயிரு, மேலிடு, பலத்திரு, நிர்ணயம் பண்ணிக்கொள், கடினமாயிரு, பெலன்அடை, எச்சரிக்கையாயிரு, பலங்கொள், தைரியமாய் ஸ்திரப்படு, திடன்கொள், திடமனதாய் இரு, மேற்கொள், துரிதப்படுத்து, உறுதியாயிரு, கெட்டியாக்கு, தைரியமாயிரு, பலவந்தமாய் பிடி, மாட்டிக்கொள், உற்சாகமாய்க் கைக்கொள்ளு
to strengthen, to prevail, to harden, to be strong, to become strong, to be courageous, to be firm, grow firm, to be resolute, to be sore
1) to be strong, to grow strong
a) to prevail, to prevail upon
b) to be firm, to be caught fast, to be secure
c) to press, to be urgent
d) to grow stout, to grow rigid, to grow hard (a bad sense)
e) to be severe, to be grievous
2) to restore to strength, to give strength
3) to strengthen, to sustain, to encourage
4) to make strong, to make bold, to encourage
6) to make rigid, to make hard
8) to have or to take or to keep hold of, to retain, to hold up, to sustain, to support
2) to put forth strength, to use one's strength

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to fasten upon; hence to seize, be strong (figuratively courageous, causatively strengthen, cure, help, repair, fortify), obstinate; to bind, restrain, conquer: - aid, amend, X calker, catch, cleave, confirm, be constant, constrain, continue, be of good (take) courage (-ous, -ly), encourage (self), be established, fasten, force, fortify, make hard, harden, help, (lay) hold (fast), lean, maintain, play the man, mend, become (wax) mighty, prevail, be recovered, repair, retain, seize, be (wax) sore, strengten (self), be stout, be (make, shew, wax) strong (-er), be sure, take (hold), be urgent, behave self valiantly, withstand.
Cognate: H2388, H2389, H2390, H2391, H2392, H2393, H2394, H2395, H2396, H3168, H3169
